column3: I go there for facials and massages. The technicians are really good. They know what they are doing. The staff is friendly and so welcoming. You leave feeling refreshed and happy.
The staff at the Diamond Bar Spa are really good. They treat you as a special person. One feels so relaxed and renewed after a visit. I go monthly and always get great service.

The personnel are really great. They always have a smile on their faces. The facial beautician I had was fantastic. She is very knowledgeable and helpful. I always feel fantastic, renewed and relaxed, when I leave.
I have been going to the same massage therapist Ana for about 3 years. I would recommend her if you want a deep tissue massage. She keeps me going since I am over 66 years old that is very important.
Best place for massage,very professional,very relaxing ..if you are looking for a good place to get a massage this is it....

I am a member in Florida and called this location on short notice and was able to book for the next day. It was easy to find and had ample parking. I paid my member price of $59 for 90 minutes which are very fair. The location was the typical layout for Massage Envy...clean and comfortable.What was special was that I was late arriving (30 minutes) and did call and say I would be late. Totally my fault. Nevertheless the therapist gave me an extra 12 minutes of her break time (same for my wife from a different therapist) to help make up the difference. GREAT service.
